job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pWe are a diversified technologyled principal trading firm We trade our own capital at our own risk across a broad range of asset classes instruments and strategies in markets around the world As the markets have evolved over the past 25 years so have we  growing to include real estate cryptocurrencies venture capital and several industry acquisitions With nearly 1200 employees at our headquarters and six global offices we work together to solve interesting problems and capture opportunities Its a place of high expectations deep curiosity and constant collaboration with some of the smartest most passionate people you will meetnbspppAs a Junior Software Developer you will be an integral member of a small team of software and hardware developers Your team will work closely with traders to solve challenging technological problems that directly impact our business You will be mentored by experienced engineers offered continuing education opportunities and be expected to handle responsibility early on in your careerppHow you will make an impactpulliWork as part of a trading desk to develop maintain and support bestinclass software systemsliliIdentify innovative solutions to complex problems and advocate for their implementation to your team by communicating your ideas in a clear and concise mannerliliDesign develop and test fullstack software systems including trading systems research tools and monitoring systemsliliWork on legacy code and greenfield development in multiple languages including Java C Ruby JavaScript Clojure and PythonliliCollaborate with traders researchers and software engineers in a closeknit team environmentliulpYou will be right at home if you havepulliA passion for computer programming and a deep curiosity to learn and absorb new technologies quicklyliliExperience developing on Linux and familiarity with the command line and BashliliExperience doing both front and backend developmentliliExperience with testdriven developmentliliA high level of ownership and accountability reliability and strong follow throughliliA strong interest and skills in computer programming and a desire for growthliulpWe do not require familiarity with or prior experience in financial markets for this roleppp
